title: Alternative to VAG Rounded
content:
Hello,

Just wondering if somebody could suggest a quite modern cut on VAG Rounded, we currently have VAG, Cocon and Co Headline but would like something quite similar to Dalton Maags creation for Telewest ( [http://www.daltonmaag.com/about/commissioning/case\_studies/telewest.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425041909/http:/www.daltonmaag.com/about/commissioning/case_studies/telewest.html "http://www.daltonmaag.com/about/commissioning/case\_studies/telewest.html") )

Any help would be more than appreciated.

Cheers,  
1981

comments.content:
Blatant self-publicity, but they fit the bill.

[Chevin and Houschka Rounded](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425041909/http:/www.type.co.uk/index.php?p=GType)

Edit: That last bit on Akira's post wasn't there when I posted this.

Nick Cooke

Ps. thanks Akira ;^)
